shri lanka parlimenthuwa - karaka sabha puwath - shri lankawe jathika ha aagamika sahajiwanaya sandaha wu parlimenthu wishesha karaka sabhawe dewani pradeshiya samuluwa mul pituwa karaka sabha puwath shri lankawe jathika ha aagamika sahajiwanaya sandaha wu parlimenthu wishesha karaka sabhawe dewani pradeshiya samuluwa shri lankawe jathika ha aagamika sahajiwanaya sandaha wu parlimenthu wishesha karaka sabhawe dewani pradeshiya samuluwa dinaya : 2018-09-25 shri lankawe jathika ha aagamika sahajiwanaya sandaha wu parlimenthu wishesha karaka sabhawe dewani pradeshiya samuluwa parlimenthuwe garu kathanayakathumage mulikathwayen, athi pujaniya maha nayaka himiwarun, anu nayaka himiwarun saha siyaluma aagam walata ayath athi gaurawaniya aagamika pujya prasadin wahanse, parlimenthuwe siyaluma paksha niyojanaya karana deshapalana prabhun, ihala pela rajya niladharin saha shri lankawe aadiwasin jananayakawarunge sahabhagithwayen 2018 okthobar masa 01 wani sandu dina perawaru 9.30 sita paswaru 2.30 dakwa ampara monti hotalayedi pawathwimata katayuthu sanwidhanaya kara atha.

rakiya madihathwimwala udaharana kihipayak pahatha dakwe: obage rakiyawa ho wruththiya thoraganima awama kirima saha awama kirima obage rakiyawen iwathwa yamata oba pidanaya yedimata samahara awasthawaladi pawa daruwanwa yodagane oyata wada karanna baha obage wada wagakim garu kirima ho nokirima kadakappal kirima durakathanayen amathima, keti paniwida yawima ho nathara kirima magin obata rakiyawak lesa hirihara kirima obe yathuru sangawima magin obata wada kirimen walakwa ganima, obe kar batari iwath kirima, awasarayakin thorawa obe motar rathaya ragena yama ho babitisiyata idiripath kirima saha pasuwa penwima nolabe hawul wathkam saha sampath palanaya kirima: meya sidu wanne aalaya sahakaru ho sahakaru ho sahakariya sambandhaya thula mudal pilibanda sampurna palanayak athi wita ha ayage awashyatha sandaha kisiwak adu ho kisidu praweshayak nomatha.

ratath, janathawath wenuwen sewaya karana siyaluma mahajana niyojithayinta paksha beda nothaka awashya sama sahayakma laba denawa – janapathi - shri lanka janadhipathiwarayage nila web adawiya ratath, janathawath wenuwen sewaya karana siyaluma mahajana niyojithayinta paksha beda nothaka awashya sama sahayakma laba denawa – janapathi rate janadhipathiwaraya lesa thamata paksha, pata beda nomathi bawa pawasu janadhipathithuma ratath, janathawath wenuwen sewaya karana siyaluma mahajana niyojithayinta paksha beda nothaka awashya sama sahayakma laba dena bawa janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mathithuma prakasha kaleya.

daksha daruwange wishishta hakiyawan niraparade kalayath ekka yata giyoth harima aparadhayak. 2008 api්rayel 3 wani dina mama shri lanka jala krida sangamayen puhunu adhyaksha dhurayen illa aswuneth kandayamak hatiyata hangimen wada karanna bari wuna nisa.mata oona wune game daksha lamayi kolambaa genath ee aya puhunu karala prawina wideshiya puhunukaruwange puhunuwa kramawathwa labadimatayi.
